item.title: Chips
item.dc:creator: @Time2Script Time2Script
item.description:
@Time2Script wrote:

Gotta Catch Them All:

Pringles - Sour cream and onion taste yummy.

Pringles are fake. They’re made out of fake potato.

lothy:

I went sour cream and onion. Light and tangy, chicken, and barbecue are also good. However, this is an incredibly strange thing to ask on the internet.

Light and Tangy - I got sick of them after eating too many watching a movie.
Chicken - Can never get sick of those
Barbeque - Read Light and Tangy’s description and you’ll know.

:):P:):P:):P:)

Read full topic
